mapper.sql: SELECT T.MBID, T.MBMC, T.MBBH, T.TCPIP, T.TCPPORT, T.MTXHSJD1, T.MTXHSJD2, T.SBWKFW, T.WBFS, T.HLFS, T.JWMK, T.KZMS, T.DWFW, T.SBGLBH, T.SBSJBH, T.SBFWCQ, T.CJR, TO_CHAR(T.CJSJ, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS CJSJ, T.XGR, TO_CHAR(T.XGSJ, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS XGSJ, T.SBYXSJKS, T.SBYXSJJS, T.CJRID, T.XGRID FROM LED_CSSZB T

if.test: mbmc != null and mbmc != '' and tag != null and tag != ''
mbbh != null and mbbh != '' and tag != null and tag != ''

mapper.update: UPDATE LED_CSSZB SET MBMC = '${mbmc}', MBBH = '${mbbh}', TCPIP = '${tcpip}', TCPPORT = '${tcpport}', SBYXSJKS = '${sbyxsjks}', SBYXSJJS = '${sbyxsjjs}', MTXHSJD1 = '${mtxhsjd1}', MTXHSJD2 = '${mtxhsjd2}', SBWKFW = '${sbwkfw}', WBFS = '${wbfs}', HLFS = '${hlfs}', JWMK = '${jwmk}', KZMS = '${kzms}', DWFW = '${dwfw}', SBGLBH = '${sbglbh}', SBSJBH = '${sbsjbh}', SBFWCQ = '${sbfwcq}', XGR = '${xgr}', XGRID = '${xgrid}', XGSJ = sysdate WHERE MBID = #{mbid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LED_CSSZB ( MBID, MBMC, MBBH, TCPIP, TCPPORT, SBYXSJKS, SBYXSJJS, MTXHSJD1, MTXHSJD2, SBWKFW, WBFS, HLFS, JWMK, KZMS, DWFW, SBGLBH, SBSJBH, SBFWCQ, CJR, CJRID, CJSJ, XGR, XGRID, XGSJ ) VALUES ( sys_guid(), '${mbmc}', '${mbbh}', '${tcpip}', '${tcpport}', '${sbyxsjks}', '${sbyxsjjs}', '${mtxhsjd1}', '${mtxhsjd2}', '${sbwkfw}', '${wbfs}', '${hlfs}', '${jwmk}', '${kzms}', '${dwfw}', '${sbglbh}', '${sbsjbh}', '${sbfwcq}', '${cjr}', '${cjrid}', sysdate, '${xgr}', '${xgrid}', sysdate )
mapper.select: SELECT MBID AS "mbid", MBMC AS "mbmc" FROM LED_CSSZB
